name: Hyspier;Aspirer
description:
Hyspier; Aspirer

Join the characters of the Aspirer on their story to understand the lore of Herifh and hopefully finding the real resolution to the real problem.

GENRE:  Simulation, Role Playing, Adventure, Visual Novel, Management

Game might contain themes and concept that is not suitable for some audience
(PG-13)

This game is currently still in progress. New features/chapters will be added. Feel free to send suggestions, bugs and discussions in the Discord server below:
(it's empty currently :>)
